output.sankey_title: Industry of graduate employment for 2012/13 academic year graduates of Agriculture, food and related studies one, three and five years after graduation (YAG), male and female Level 7 (research) graduates from English HEIs, APs and FECs, 2018/19 tax year.
output.sankeytext1:
For  both female and male ,  Level 7 (research)  graduates who studied Agriculture, food and related studies , the industry with the highest
                      proportion of graduates one year after graduation is  Education  ( 50.6 %), and at five years after graduation it is  Professional, scientific and technical activities  ( 45.2 %).
output.sankeytext2:
The most movement between one and three years after graduation is seen for Manufacturing, where 460 graduates move to Wholesale and retail trade - repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles. Between three and five
                       years after graduation it's seen for Education where2,375 graduates moved to Other.
